title: Planning Your Parent's Funeral with Mama Fran
description:
This week, Mama Fran is back on the Pod! Fran's instagram gets liked by a superstar, and Joe learns something new about his childhood , before they read some of the funniest funeral plans submitted by the Socialite Nation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
